attributes.action: Review COVID-19 Tiers based on a district basis and not on county-wide basis
attributes.additional_details: Because the current county based method is unfair and unjust. Currently, as an example, Broxbourne has a rate of 562.3 per 100,000 whilst Stevenage has a rate of just 144.6 per 100,000. It is unfair to have the same treatment for such a variation of figures.
attributes.background: To not look at whole counties when reviewing which coronavirus tier restrictions to apply. Instead, review this on district basis.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allocate council/district areas to Covid-19 tiers based on local data
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562176
